repo.name: rofs-filtered
repo.description: A filtered read-only filesystem for FUSE

readme.summary: Well-structured documentation with clear use cases and installation steps, but lacks a simple quick-start example and could better explain configuration file syntax inline.
readme.top_issue: No standalone quick-start example showing the simplest possible usage from install to running mount command with actual paths

injection_risks.description: The regcomp function is used with user-controlled input from the configuration file, which could lead to a denial-of-service attack if the input is crafted to cause excessive backtracking.
The regcomp function does not handle errors robustly, which could lead to information disclosure in case of an error.

critical_findings: Potential denial-of-service attack through crafted configuration file input
security.summary: The code has some security concerns related to input validation and error handling, but no critical vulnerabilities were found.

common_complaints: Configuration file parsing issues (fstab syntax, empty lines)
Lack of feature functionality (empty directory pruning, config reload without remount)
Special file handling limitations in invert mode
sentiment.summary: The project shows significant abandonment with 7 of 12 issues unresolved since 2016-2021, zero maintainer responses to open issues, multiple regression bugs, and unaddressed user frustration regarding core functionality like configuration handling and directory filtering.

communication.summary: The maintainer responses are generally helpful and clear, showing patience with repeated questions. Technical depth is adequate but could be deeper in some cases.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being recent (Jan 2025)
11 open issues with no activity or resolution
Zero closed issues in past 6 months indicating no maintenance
No merged PRs in past 6 months showing no active development
No active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown release date suggests lack of version management
maintenance.summary: This package appears abandoned with no maintenance activity despite recent code presence, evidenced by unresolved issues and zero commits, merges, or contributor activity over the past 6 months.

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The documentation is generally well-structured and informative, but could benefit from more concise quick start instructions and additional troubleshooting guidance.
concerns: No commits in the past six months, indicating a lack of recent development or updates.
Open issues and PRs suggest ongoing problems that need attention.
Docs: Lack of clear and concise quick start instructions for new users
Security: Potential denial-of-service attack through crafted configuration file input
highlights: 8 contributors active in the past six months, which shows some level of community involvement.
There are open PRs, suggesting potential improvements or features being worked on.
